Html:
The C# mutex class works across processes. The FifoMutex implementation on this project does not seem to work across process (or at least the constructor is missing the parameter)

Is there any FifoMutex that works across processes?
I just saw the implementation. There is no way it can work across processes by locking objects.
It's not intended nor designed to work across processes, I'm afraid.

Any idea where I could get a fifomutex that works across processes like the regular mutex?
I'm afraid I will have to develop one and I do not have the time for it
